Module weasel.javafx.annotations
Package cc.chordflower.weasel.javafx.utilities.controls

Class ContextMenuBuilder

java.lang.Object
cc.chordflower.weasel.javafx.utilities.controls.ContextMenuBuilder
@AvailableSince("0.1.0") public final class ContextMenuBuilder extends Object
This is a fluent builder for creating a JavaFX ContextMenu.
